metadata.description:
The ba.i.six company is proud to introduce the latest in home technology— ha.i.ley. The most advanced housekeeping  artificial intelligence ever made.
She's programmed for your every need.
Cutting edge. 
Ready for any task.
Calculated to make you happy. 
Too good to be true.
"ha.i.ley is a page-turning, blood-pumping, sci-fi horror— a frightening future that is right around the corner,  waiting to devour us all!"
—Gary Dauberman
metadata.name: Ha.i.ley
